thread.title: Toomey bill seeks to address national heroin epidemic

title: Toomey bill seeks to address national heroin epidemic
text:
Published By: Pittsburgh Post: Health - Today 
At 13, Ashley Potts took her first OxyContin pill and eventually became addicted. Four years later, she switched to heroin at only $10 a bag...
